title: 21st-Century Educational Technology Integration Design: Simulation/VR-Based Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology concepts and experience in teaching social studies
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service and in-service teachers to acquire competencies in designing social studies lessons using digital tools, with case-based learning to address security and ethical issues during technology integration

learning_goals: Independently designing technology-integrated social studies lessons linked to VR simulations at least three times
Analyzing potential personal data protection issues during educational technology implementation and proposing response strategies
Collaboratively developing inclusive learning environment design guidelines to address the digital divide
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
